translation.en: The Dark Army approaches, my lord. But there is still time for us to escape.
translation.ja: 闇の軍勢が迫っています逃げましょう

translation.en: Why do you think he did it?
I offered him land to last his families a lifetime over.
translation.ja: あれほどの領地を与えたのに

translation.en: How could one be so stupid?
Mitsuhide's prejudice grew beyond repair. Hojo Daimyo warped his mind
translation.ja: 光秀は闇の大名に唆され

translation.en: and fed his anger with power and corruption.
translation.ja: 力と悪意を与えられた

translation.en: [lord] I was referring to me.
[grunts] And look at you, Yasuke.
From servant to samurai. The only one who didn't betray me.
translation.ja: 小者から侍まで裏切り残ったのはお前だけ

translation.en: -[metallic clink] -We should drink to that.
We do not have time for this. The Daimyo is going to bring hell through those doors.
translation.ja: 時間がありません敵が今にも入ってきます

translation.en: Let them come.
They are the guest of honor to our little party.
translation.ja: 宴(うたげ)の主賓にしてやろう

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Yasuke, take it.
Drink with me. Celebrate this moment.
translation.ja: ワシと この時を祝おう

translation.en: [raising voice] What is there to celebrate, my lord?
Your forces are scattered. Your dream of a unified Japan is gone.
translation.ja: 軍は散り散りになり天下統一の夢は破れ

translation.en: -The temple walls burn as we speak-- -I am still your lord.
If I die here, perhaps Mitsuhide will let Ranmaru live.
translation.ja: ワシが死ねば光秀は蘭丸を見逃すだろう

translation.en: Are you sure he made it out in time?
He was smuggled out on the last ship, just as you requested.
translation.ja: ご命令どおり船に忍び込ませました

translation.en: -Was he afraid? -No, he was strong.
translation.ja: 怯(おび)えていたか？ いえ 勇敢でした

translation.en: Good.
Now, all that is left for me is an honorable death.
translation.ja: あとはワシが名誉ある死を迎えるだけだ

translation.en: My lord, if we barricade the side entrance
translation.ja: 通用口を塞ぎ敵を門から入らせれば

translation.en: and force them to enter through the halls, we can bottleneck their forces
translation.ja: 通用口を塞ぎ敵を門から入らせれば 一度に押し寄せられず有利に戦えます

translation.en: and then cut them down in waves.
translation.ja: 一度に押し寄せられず有利に戦えます

translation.en: I appoint you, Yasuke, as kaishakunin.
translation.ja: お前を介錯(かいしゃく)人に指名する

translation.en: This is my final command of you, my friend.
translation.ja: 最後の命令だ　友よ

translation.en: What? I don't understand. We could still fight back.
translation.ja: なぜですか　まだ戦えます

translation.en: [lord] This is the only way to save Ranmaru.
No, there is no honor in this.
translation.ja: このような死に名誉はない

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Thank you, Yasuke.
translation.ja: 大儀であった 弥助

translation.en: [gasping] What are you waiting for?
Over here!
Yassan! Over here!
translation.ja: ヤッサン こっちだ

translation.en: [all] Thanks!
Yassan!
I almost landed my attack this time.
translation.ja: 当てられそうだったのに

translation.en: Stop bothering me. I don't care.
translation.ja: 私に構うな　邪魔だ

translation.en: Ichiro, I told you, no training in my bar.
translation.ja: 一郎 店での稽古はやめろ

translation.en: You're scaring away the customers.
[Ichiro] How do you grow your hair like that?
translation.ja: 髪は どうなってるの？出身は？

translation.en: Where do you come from? How did you get here?
translation.ja: 髪は どうなってるの？出身は？ なぜ ここに？

translation.en: Who taught you how to fight? Can they teach me? Can you teach me?
translation.ja: 戦いは誰に教わった？おれに教えてよ

translation.en: I wanna fight in battles like the great samurai warriors before me.
translation.ja: かつての侍たちみたいに戦いたいんだ

translation.en: I will succeed where they failed and defeat the Daimyo.
translation.ja: 意志を継いで闇の大名を倒す

translation.en: A true warrior, above all else, prays for peace. Not war.
translation.ja: 本物の武士は戦いではなく平穏を望む

translation.en: [Ichiro] War brings peace. Peace brings freedom.
translation.ja: 戦いで平穏を得て自由な世にするんだ

translation.en: I will save the land from the evil Daimyo.
translation.ja: 闇の大名から国を守る

translation.en: Who am I? I'm the greatest warrior in all the land.
translation.ja: おれは日本一の武士だ

translation.en: -Huah! [gasps] -[man] Shut up. Stay right there!
Who goes there?
[woman] Practicing your swordplay again?
[Ichiro] Practice? I'm a master.
translation.ja: 違う　おれは達人だ

translation.en: Master? Of what?
Hey, Ichiro. Fight any bad guys today?
translation.ja: 一郎 今日も悪人と戦った？

translation.en: Yep. Two soldiers outside the village. Had them running scared.
translation.ja: 兵士がおれを恐れて逃げたよ

translation.en: -[sighs] Those soldiers are dangerous. -I'm dangerous too.
translation.ja: 危険な兵士だよ おれは強い

translation.en: -[chuckles] It's that samurai kid. -I'm not a kid!
translation.ja: 侍坊やだな 子供じゃない

translation.en: Yes, you are!
Can anyone help?
Whatever you can spare.
Mercy.
Thank you!
[boy] Ichiro!
Get him!
Hey! Come back here. Damn it!
translation.ja: おい こっちに来い

translation.en: Take off that silly mask.
A samurai never shows his face.
[girl] Ichiro, I've already seen your face.
translation.ja: 一郎の顔は もう知ってるよ

translation.en: So, Mr. Samurai, did you finally land an attack on Yassan?
translation.ja: 侍さん 今日はヤッサンに剣を当てられた？

translation.en: No, but I came really close this time.
translation.ja: いや でも惜しかった

translation.en: I approached from his blind side, but he felt me coming. I'll be better next time. [grunts]
translation.ja: 死角から襲っても気付かれた次は当てる

translation.en: [chuckling] I know you will.
Here, you try.
[grunts softly] I don't know.
It's okay. You'll get your strength back soon enough.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　すぐ元気になるよ

translation.en: [gasps] My bokken.
Yassan gave me this.
translation.ja: ヤッサンがくれたのに

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know what happened.
translation.ja: ごめんなんで折れたんだろう

translation.en: Saki, are you all right?
translation.ja: 咲希(さき) 平気かい？

translation.en: I'm okay, Mother.
You're on fire. Here, take this.
translation.ja: 熱が高い　これを飲んで

translation.en: What happened?
Saki was holding it, and it just split in two. How will I train?
translation.ja: 咲希が持ったら折れたんだ困ったな

translation.en: [Saki] What's wrong, Mother?
I think it's time I take you to see the doctor.
But you always said the doctor was a great journey away.
translation.ja: でも お医者様は遠くにいるんでしょ？

translation.en: I like it here with my friends.
There will be no discussion on this.
-How long is the journey? -[sighs]
A week on foot.
Yassan could get you there in a day or two.
The Black boatsman?
Yes. He will be your guide, and I will be your protection.
translation.ja: 彼が案内しておれが２人を守るよ

translation.en: A child who thinks he's a samurai.
I will be one, one day.
Vodka.
What's that?
I'm looking for someone. A woman with child. A little girl.
translation.ja: 幼い娘がいる女を捜してる

translation.en: Well, there's plenty of women and children here.
translation.ja: 子持ちの女は山ほどいる

translation.en: Yeah, sometimes they piss themselves whenever they get too drunk.
translation.ja: 奴(やつ)らは酔うと小便を漏らすんだ

translation.en: Wait, no drink?
Come with me.
We have some fun.
Me?
Me?
I guess that's a vodka.
[lord] What are you waiting for?
An empty bottle. I've failed you.
[man] Black boatsman!
What do you have for us today?
-[man 2] Lunch. -[man 1 chuckling] Oh…
Next time, Black boatsman.
Next time.
How did I do, Yassan?
Hmm. You would have done better with your bokken.
I'm sorry. It split in two.
translation.ja: ごめん 折っちゃった

translation.en: I made that myself. You're not strong enough to split it in two.
translation.ja: 私が作った剣だお前には折れない

translation.en: -I didn't break it! -[Saki's mother] Black boatsman.
translation.ja: おれじゃない 黒人の船頭！

translation.en: This little one here says you can help my daughter.
translation.ja: 娘を助けてほしいんだ

translation.en: My name is Ichika. I sing here sometimes.
translation.ja: 私は一華(いちか)　この酒場の歌手だ

translation.en: Yes, I know who you are.
You have a… [hesitates] …lovely voice.
Thank you.
-[Yasuke] You have a daughter? -Yes.
translation.ja: 娘がいるのか ああ

translation.en: That's who broke my bokken.
My daughter has grown very ill.
We must travel upstream a few days' journey for her to be cared for.
translation.ja: 数日かけて川を上り医者に診せたい

translation.en: The village here has a doctor who can provide care.
translation.ja: この村にも医者はいるだろう

translation.en: -There's no need to travel upstream. -This is a special doctor.
translation.ja: この村にも医者はいるだろう 特別な医者なんだ行かないと娘は死ぬ

translation.en: If we don't go, she will die.
translation.ja: 特別な医者なんだ行かないと娘は死ぬ

translation.en: [Yasuke] She will die if we go.
No one returns from the north. The journey would be suicide. The warring territory is too dangerous.
translation.ja: 北は戦地だ行って戻った人はいない

translation.en: The risk of the journey is worth saving her life.
translation.ja: 娘のためなら危険も承知だ

translation.en: Just take her to the village doctor.
You have no honor!
You have no idea what honor is, boy.
Honor is not willingly giving up your life.
translation.ja: 死ぬ覚悟は誇りではない

translation.en: Please, Yassan, save her.
translation.ja: お願い　咲希を助けて

translation.en: I said it's too dangerous.
[man] You will love what we brought. These items come from far and wide.
translation.ja: いかがです？世界各地から集めた品です

translation.en: You will be the only man on this side of the world to claim such treasures.
translation.ja: 世界の裏側の宝を得られるのですよ

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Ranmaru.
What do you think?
I think it is beautiful, my lord.
translation.ja: すばらしいです 殿

translation.en: I'll take it. Show me more.
What did you say, boy? You tell me I have no honor?
translation.ja: ワシに誇りがないと言ったか

translation.en: You will pay for your insolence.
[in English] What honor is there in striking down a child?
translation.ja: 子供を斬れば誇りを失う

translation.en: What's going on here?
I shall stop this at once.
Wait. This could be interesting.
translation.ja: 待て　面白くなりそうだ

translation.en: Of course.
You dare speak to me? You allow your servant to speak?
translation.ja: おい 奴隷に口を利かせるな

translation.en: I apologize for his slippery tongue.
translation.ja: うるさい奴で申し訳ない

translation.en: He should know his place, shut his mouth.
translation.ja: 身の程を知れ　黙らせろ

translation.en: -[people gasp] -[Yasuke] Leave the boy alone.
Guess I'll have to shut your mouth for you.
[merchant, nervously] I am so sorry, Lord Nobunaga. He will not go unpunished.
translation.ja: 信長公私が罰しておきますので

translation.en: No need. He fought well.
translation.ja: よい　いい戦いぶりだ

translation.en: A man deserves to be clean. Wash him.
translation.ja: それより体を洗ってやれ

translation.en: Why is he not clean?
It is not dirt. It is the color of his skin, my lord.
translation.ja: 泥ではなく肌が黒いのです

translation.en: Did you ink your skin black?
No, I was born with black skin.
You were born with black skin?
[Yasuke] Yes.
Interesting. What is your name?
translation.ja: 面白い　お前の名は？

translation.en: Eusebio Ibrahimo Baloi.
translation.ja: ユセビオ･イブリモ･バロイ

translation.en: Eu-- I--
Eusebio Ibrahimo Baloi.
translation.ja: ユセビオ･イブリモ･バロイ

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] I-- I apologize for his rudeness.
translation.ja: 無礼を おわびします

translation.en: The Yao people have a… [hesitates] …strong cultural identity.
translation.ja: ヤオ族は自分の文化にこだわるんです

translation.en: Hmm. Yao. How about Yasuke?
translation.ja: ヤオ族か　なら弥助だな

translation.en: I like him.
I'll take him too.
[Ichika] Make sure you have everything. If we leave now, we can avoid the patrols.
translation.ja: 今すぐ出発すれば巡回に見つからない

translation.en: [hushed] Mother. Someone is here.
You're right to leave now.
Patrols are light at this time. It's wise to gain ground before dawn.
translation.ja: 夜明け前なら見回りは少ない

translation.en: Is Yassan taking us, Mother?
translation.ja: ヤッサンも来てくれるの？

translation.en: Yes. He is.
Beautiful land and home. Lord Nobunaga shows favor.
translation.ja: いい家だね　信長公によほど気に入られたらしい

translation.en: Impressive, especially for an outsider such as yourself.
translation.ja: よそ者なのに大したもんだ

translation.en: -You were there that day. -Indeed. You saved my little brother here.
translation.ja: あの日の… ああ 弟を救ってくれたね

translation.en: For that, you have my gratitude.
Where I'm from, it's everyone's duty to protect the children of the land.
translation.ja: 私の国では大人は子供を守るものだ

translation.en: -You're a samurai, yes? -Onna Bugeisha.
translation.ja: お前は侍か？ 女武芸者だよ

translation.en: [Yasuke] Is it common in this country for a woman to gain such a high military rank?
translation.ja: 日本では出世できる女が多いのか？

translation.en: [woman] No. No, it is not.
[Yasuke] Impressive.
[woman] Nobunaga awards those who have proven themselves. As you can attest.
translation.ja: 信長公は実力で評価なさるあんたの時と同じだ

translation.en: You could have defended your brother yourself. Why didn't you?
translation.ja: なぜ自分の弟を守らなかった？

translation.en: The code of the samurai forbids me to interfere when honor is challenged.
translation.ja: 誇りを試されてる時に間に入るのは武士道に反する

translation.en: My brother made a grave mistake.
What you did was honorable in its own right. You have my respect.
translation.ja: だが あんたの行いは敬意に値する

translation.en: And whose respect do I have?
I am Natsumaru.
And what do they call you, the samurai that was once a servant?
translation.ja: 奴隷から侍になった男の名は？

translation.en: Yasuke.
[Ichika] You snore.
Hm-- What's her name?
Saki. She's gotten worse in the past few weeks.
translation.ja: 咲希だ　最近 急に悪化した

translation.en: Does she always sweat like this?
The sweating is new.
You should get more rest.
The boy wants to be a great warrior. He looks up to you.
translation.ja: 一郎は侍になりたくてあんたに憧れてる

translation.en: Why? Who are you?
I'm just a boatsman.
Nothing special about me. He's just impatient to become a man.
translation.ja: 一郎は大人に憧れてるだけだ

translation.en: Well, I've seen the way you move to avoid his attacks.
translation.ja: 一郎の刀を見事に避けてただろう

translation.en: I hear the things you say, the way you yell out in your sleep, like a man haunted by his past.
translation.ja: 寝てる間のあんたの叫びは過去に苦しんでるようだった

translation.en: The necklace you wear.
That symbol is familiar. I-I've seen it before.
translation.ja: その家紋には見覚えがあるな

translation.en: -[Ichika] Why are you doing this? -Doing what?
translation.ja: 理由を聞いても？ 何の？

translation.en: Helping us. Why did you change your mind?
translation.ja: なぜ助ける気になった？

translation.en: [Yasuke] One village.
[Ichika] And what does that mean?
[Yasuke] Where I'm from, every man and woman cares for every child.
translation.ja: 私の国では大人は子供を守っていた

translation.en: It is our duty to make sure every child is safe.
translation.ja: 全ての子を守るのが務めだ

translation.en: -[Saki coughing] -[Ichika] It's okay.
[Yasuke] I've seen many illnesses but nothing like this.
translation.ja: こんな病気は見たことがない

translation.en: She's a special child. She requires special care. That is all you need to know.
translation.ja: 咲希には特別な手当てが要るただ それだけだ

translation.en: Why are you stopping?
I am not stopping.
[robot] He's Black.
We can see that.
[robot] I thought you were the only Black man in Japan.
translation.ja: あなた以外に日本に黒人が？

translation.en: [chuckles] Apparently not.
[robot] Are you two related?
[man] Shut up, scrap metal.
[woman] He's kinda cute for an old man.
translation.ja: 爺(じい)さんだが いい男だ

translation.en: [robot] Your attraction to him is illogical.
translation.ja: 惚(ほ)れるのは計算外です

translation.en: The child, Chernyy.
Why are you here for this child?
So be it, Chernyy.
translation.ja: 戦うか？　黒人(チョルヌィ)よ

translation.en: So be it, indeed.
-[in English] What was that? -He just spoke Japanese.
The Black man spoke Japanese?
Yes. I spoke Japanese.
You speak Japanese and recite ancient proverbs. You must have lived a good life.
translation.ja: 日本語で格言を？いい暮らしをしてたんだな

translation.en: -Mother! -[groaning]
[yells] Leave us alone!
